TITLE: Configuring Tailwind CSS with tailwindcss-motion (ESM)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to add the tailwindcss-motion plugin to your tailwind.config.js file using ESM syntax.  The plugin is imported and then included in the plugins array to activate motion utilities.  The `content` array specifies the files Tailwind should scan for class names.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rombohq/tailwindcss-motion/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import tailwindcssMotion from "tailwindcss-motion";

/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
export default {
     content: [...],
     theme: {
          extend: {},
     },
     plugins: [tailwindcssMotion],
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Tailwind CSS with tailwindcss-motion (JavaScript)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to add the tailwindcss-motion plugin to your tailwind.config.js file.  The plugin is required within the plugins array to enable the motion utilities.  The `content` array specifies the files Tailwind should scan for class names.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rombohq/tailwindcss-motion/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// tailwind.config.js

export default {
     content: [...],
     theme: {
        extend: {...},
     },
     plugins: [require('tailwindcss-motion')],
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: TypeScript Configuration with custom motion properties
DESCRIPTION: This TypeScript snippet shows how to configure and customize the tailwindcss-motion plugin within a Tailwind CSS configuration file.  It defines types for `Config` and imports the `motion` plugin.  The `extend` property in the `theme` section allows for custom `motionScale` and `motionTimingFunction` values to be defined.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rombohq/tailwindcss-motion/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import type { Config } from "tailwindcss";
import motion from "tailwindcss-motion";

const config: Config = {
  theme: {
    extend: {
      motionScale: {
        "200": "200%",
      },
      motionTimingFunction: {
        custom: "cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)",
      },
    },
  },
  plugins: [motion],
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing tailwindcss-motion
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the tailwindcss-motion plugin as a development dependency using npm. It's a necessary first step to use the plugin in a Tailwind CSS project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rombohq/tailwindcss-motion/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i -D tailwindcss-motion
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Astro Project Initialization via NPM
DESCRIPTION: This command initializes a new Astro project using the 'basics' template. It uses the npm package manager to create a new Astro project with a predefined basic structure.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rombohq/tailwindcss-motion/blob/main/web/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm create astro@latest -- --template basics
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Astro Project File Structure
DESCRIPTION: This code block outlines the basic directory structure of an Astro project created with the 'basics' template. It highlights the location of pages, components, and static assets within the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rombohq/tailwindcss-motion/blob/main/web/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
/
├── public/
│   └── favicon.svg
├── src/
│   ├── components/
│   │   └── Card.astro
│   ├── layouts/
│   │   └── Layout.astro
│   └── pages/
│       └── index.astro
└── package.json
```
